description:
The Pelmo Shorts for men was developed specifically for the needs of mountaineers who have to rely on their clothing on long days - and still want to be light on the road.

Thanks to the cut and design of Shield Zero material, the Pelmo Shorts are ready for every hard-fought altitude meter. The versatile all-rounder scores with high breathability, a low weight, high elasticity and the extremely robust material mix. Inserts with merino wool in the waistband and on the pocket pouch provide maximum comfort in all the right places.

All this has made the Pelmo Shorts for men a deserved classic. The PFC-free pants are an excellent companion on all alpine ventures where lightness and functionality are required.
name: Ortovox Pelmo Shorts - Mens
